name: Quest to the Dragon's Lair
description:
Game Synopsis

Playing as a young hero, you must use your heroic skills to navigate through tough terrain, talk your way out of tricky situations, and escape certain death. Your quest is to join your comrades at the Dragon’s Lair tavern, for a flagon of mead, before your next adventure.

Game Overview
Quest to the Dragon’s Lair is a single player, fantasy, adventure game. It parodies text-based adventure games, and old school pixel games, via tropes and narration.
